item.title: Hey how do i get monsters in the game :P
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

this is a simple solve.

ok first:
go to your client folder and open up the autospawn.cfg file.

second:
add a new line at the bottom or what ever… saying something like this: ( after spawn = 494 push tab everytime you want to type the next #, not space!)

spawn = 494	2893	9910	0	0	0	0	0	1	Varrock East Bank Male Banker

let me explain… the spawn=494 is the npc you want to add , the next two numbers are the X,Y coords… .the first 0 is the height… (0=ground 1=first floor 2=second floor.) the rest of the 0 0 0 0 's is the range of the npc… ( if you wanted it to walk , for this one it doesnt move…) and then the varrock east bank male it the despriction of the character so u kno wat it is later.

hope you understand.

~bryanc~

Read full topic
